content: To the Chief Musician; set to a Philistine lute. A Psalm of the sons of Korah.
My soul (my life, my inner self) longs for and greatly desires the courts of the ;
My heart and my flesh sing for joy to the living God.
The bird has found a house,
And the swallow a nest for herself, where she may lay her youngâ€”
